item.title: Understanding Hugo Shortcodes
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Bino Kochumol Varghese)
item.description: Hugo shortcodes are powerful tools for adding custom HTML or other special content within Markdown files without complex code. They enable enhanced flexibility and are a core part of Hugo’s functionality, offering reusable snippets for embedding media, custom components, or dynamic content. Below, we’ll explore what shortcodes are and highlight some popular examples.

item.title: Lightbi Custom Shortcodes
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Bino Kochumol Varghese)
item.description:
To create your own shortcodes in Hugo, add an HTML file in layouts/shortcodes/. This theme provides the following useful custom shortcodes:

Info card

Displays information in a card format.

Shortcode
{{/* < info_cards header="lorem-ipsum" title="What is Lorem Ipsum?" content="Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry." > */}}
Output
What is Lorem Ipsum?

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
